zapaddon.name: Ajax Spider
zapaddon.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax
zapaddon.author: ZAP Dev Team
zapaddon.changes:
Promoted to 'release' status (Issue 1326).
Set to depend on 'Selenium' add-on (Issue 1534).
Updated Crawljax to version 3.6 (Issue 1535).
Advanced scan dialog (Issue 1177).
